title: ET Explains: What is PM Surya Ghar Muft Bijli Yojana, and how will it work?
description: It is a scheme that aims to provide free electricity to households who opt to install rooftop solar electricity units. The households will be able to get 300 units of electricity free every month. The scheme focuses on the household segment with up to 3 kW system, which covers most of the residential consumers in India.
